publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1991 Mike Rumbles: Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places—That the Parliament notes the intention of the Scottish Executive to introduce a ban on smoking in enclosed public places; recognises that the Executive has already acted to make its buildings smoke-free; believes that the Parliament should lead by example and make its building a smoke-free area, and calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to reconsider its decision to allow smoking on the premises. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, Mike Pringle*, Iain Smith*, Jeremy Purvis*
S2M-1991 Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places (lodged on 10 November 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Michael McMahon*, Mr John Swinney*, John Swinburne*, Stewart Stevenson*, Bristow Muldoon*

S2M-1991 Mike Rumbles: Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places—That the Parliament notes the intention of the Scottish Executive to introduce a ban on smoking in enclosed public places; recognises that the Executive has already acted to make its buildings smoke-free; believes that the Parliament should lead by example and make its building a smoke-free area, and calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to reconsider its decision to allow smoking on the premises. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Mike Pringle, Iain Smith, Jeremy Purvis, Eleanor Scott, Michael McMahon, Mr John Swinney, John Swinburne, Stewart Stevenson, Bristow Muldoon
S2M-1991 Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places (lodged on 10 November 2004) Margo MacDonald*
S2M-1991 Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places (lodged on 10 November 2004) Michael Matheson*, George Lyon*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1991 Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places (lodged on 10 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1991 Ban on Smoking in Enclosed Public Places (lodged on 10 November 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
